scripts.start: trap 'docker-compose down; exit 0' INT; docker-compose up --build & nodemon -e 'yml js' --exec 'sls offline start -s local --skipCacheInvalidation'
scripts.start:qa: trap 'docker-compose down; exit 0' INT; docker-compose up --build & nodemon -e 'yml js' --exec 'sls offline start -s qa --skipCacheInvalidation'
scripts.deploy: export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=$AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID; export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY; sls deploy -s PROD --force;
